unnormalised: Bore, koni tori differential calculus vixim vicharla. Kamar kasa, bhurgea, kiteak mhonnlear hi ek dum ranvadhi yatra zateli! Mullaveponnan, sogllem vostu kitench bodoltai tem sodun kaddpa vixim asa. Hench toren vichar: tuzo chai thondd zata. Calculus tuka exact kitench vegaan to dumdumit ushnna (90°C bhaxen) "meh, azun piyevpak zata" (kiteak tor 50°C?) zatam tem sodpak modot korta. Punn tem fokot temperature vixim matrenh na.
normalised: Boro, konnem differential calculus vixim vicharlem. Kamar kas bandat, kiteak hi ek tufaani savari zateli! Mullant, hi vostu kitlem bodlotat tem sodun kaddpa vixim asa. Toxem chintat: tumchi chai thondd zata. Calculus tumkam *exactly* kitlem vegaan ti ekdom gorom (nove degree celsius sarkhem) asun "meh, azun piyopak favo" (zaiten ponnas degree celsius?) zatat tem kollpak modot korta. Punn fokot temperature vixim nhoi.

unnormalised: Sanga tor tum Delhi thaun Agra meren tuzo Bajaj scooter cholaita. Differential calculus tuka kitench zagear tuzo veeg calculate korpak modot korta. Derivative, tem mukhel! Tem mullaveponnan eka kallant eka vankddeache dhal sodunk asa. Ani khorench, tum Bajaj-ant 80 kmph korun choloytat zalear, tum calculus nastana opayache jivnn jiyetat. Mhoji aaji mhonnitalem ki calculus xikonk biryani korpa poros kathin asa. Torui hanv calculus-an ut'teern zali punn hanv aaji poros bore biryani korunk xokona.
normalised: Dharta ki tumhi tumchi Bajaj scooter Delhi thaun Agra-k choloytat. Differential calculus tumkam *konnachem* punn kshannan tumchi speed ganak korpak modot korta. Derivative, tem mukhya! Tem ekach point-an curve-acho slope sodun kaddpa sarkhem asta. Ani satyean, tumhi Bajaj-ar assun eighty kilometer-an choloytat zalear, calculus nastana-i tumhi bhayanak jivit jiyetat. Mhoji aaji mhunntali calculus shikop perfect biryani korpa thaun kathin. Punn hanvem calculus-an achi mark melloylea, punn hanv azun tiche thaun bori biryani korunk shakat na.

unnormalised: Atam, tumik kiteak goroz asa? Boreponnan, engineers tem pul bandunk vaporunk xakta (kiteak tem poddona mhunn umed asa!) smartphones (kiteak tum nirontor Instagram-ant scroll korun astam). Economists tem bazarachi stithi predict korpak vaporunk xakta (torui khorench zau di, tankam chukunuch lagta). Doctorsui tem vaporunk xakta! (Bore, kiteak tor direkth na, punn MRI machine tem vaporunk calculus principleracher nirbor asa.) Tuzo JEE exam-an tumik eka kathin equationacho dy/dx sodunk poddlo tor proshn astolo. Tem sarkem kor, ani tum IIT-chea ek pavl chodd laggin asa.
normalised: Atam, tumkam kiteak kallji gheunchi zai? Engineers tem bridges design korpak vaportat (urik zalear poddche nhui!), smartphones design korpak vaportat (tumkam nirantar Instagram-ar scroll korpak mellche poddta). Economists market trends predict korpak vaportat (punn satya sangonk zalear, tankam sadharan chukta). Doctors punn tem vaportat! (Boro, sidhe rupan nhoi zaiten, punn tim vapartat tem M-R-I machine calculus siddantancher adarit asa.) Tumchea J-E-E exam-an tumkam d y divided by d x ek kotthin equation-acho sodun kaddunk lagta ashem question-an asta. Tem borem korat, ani tumhi I-I-T-iche lagim ek pavl bhov lagim zatat.

unnormalised: Bore, tuka zai asli zalear. Differential calculus ek nut shell-ant asa. Tem sogllem bodol, dar, ani dhal vixim asa. Ani mhojer patie, tem xikonk dusri Bollywood filmanchi marathon pollelea poros chodd utpadok asa (kiteak tor, boreponnan, tum marathonachya vellar snack-acho vapor optimize korpak calculus vapartai – atam *tem* kitem tari uttam vichar!). Tum tuje crush-ak tuje nove math-ache gunn dakhouunk xokta! (Disclaimer: result bodlollo yeta. Calculus thoddoch ek patiev divpi romance booster asa.) Plus, ek da tumik somzolem zalear, tum tankam hansounk xokta zankam azunui dista 2 + 2 = 5 mhunn. Fokot chidounk... chodd korun.
normalised: Toxem, tumchea lagim asa. Differential calculus ek nut-shell-an. Tem bodlop, rates ani slopes vixim asta. Ani mhojer visvas dovrat, tem shikop dusrem Bollywood moviem marathon binge-watch korpa thaun odik utpadak asa (urik tumhi calculus-k marathon-an tumchea snack consumption-ak optimize korpak vapartat zalear nhoi – atam *tem* next-level thinking asta!). Tumchi crush-ak tumchea novea melllelea math skills-an tumkam impress korpak mellta! (Disclaimer: Results bodlunk xakta. Calculus romance-ak vadhavpak ek guarantee nhoi.) Ani, tumkam tem samzaleamari, tumhi lokank hasunk xakta zannank azun chintat don ani don miloun panch zata mhunnon. Just kidding... chodd korun.
